boone.training

Class SOMTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.Trainer
      • boone.training.SOMTrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LVQTrainer

    public class SOMTrainer
extends Trainer
    The unsupervised SOM training algorithm implementing a simple dot product SOM with a linearly decreasing learn rate and a linearly decreasing neighborhood radius. The default learn rate is 100.0 and is decreased according to eta = eta / (currentEpoch + 1). The initial neighborhood radius is decreased linearly so that after all epochs the radius is 1.0. The default initial neighborhood radius is 3.0.
    Author:
    ghowa, Helmut A. Mayer

      • train

        protected void train(Neuron neuron,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.Double> inputPattern,
                     double learnRate)
        Updates the weights from all input neurons to the given map neuron and normalizes the new weights. The specific weight update follows the "Dot-Product SOM" (Kohonen 2001: 115) m(t+1) = m(t)+ a'(t)x(t)/||m(t) + a'(t)x(t)|| where m is the map neuron vector, x the input vector, and a' the learn rate
        Parameters:
        neuron - a map neuron
        inputPattern - a pattern
        learnRate - the learn rate
